Module com.arcane.arithmetic

Class CheatsModePasswordPromptController

java.lang.Object
com.arcane.arithmetic.CheatsModePasswordPromptController
public class CheatsModePasswordPromptController extends Object
This is the Cheat Mode Password Prompt Controller, used for controls and events in the cheat mode passwrod prompt.
Author:
Justin Xu
